title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 311.2 - Participation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 311.2 - Participation

State Regulations

The Office of General Services as a Contracting Agency, as
defined in Executive Order No. 125, will participate in and comply with the
activities and procedures of such Contracting Agencies, pursuant to the
implementating Procedures of the Council of Contracting Agencies titled
"Council of Contracting Agencies, Executive Order No. 125, Procedures for

Collection and Exchange of Information Relating to Contractor Responsibility"
and its attachments, which was adopted and published by the Council of

Contracting Agencies on January 11, 1990. Copies of this document and its
attachments may be obtained from the publisher at the following address: Council of Contracting Agencies, Office of the Chair, The

Commissioner of General Services, Mayor Erastus Corning 2nd Tower, The Governor

Nelson A. Rockefeller, Empire State Plaza, Albany, New York 12242. This material is available for public inspection and
copying at the following office: Counsel's Office, Office of General Services, 41st Floor, Mayor Erastus Corning 2nd Tower, The Governor Nelson A. Rockefeller, Empire

State Plaza, Albany, New York 12242. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
311.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
